S06n584:1: atha khalu tasmin samaye'nyataro devaputrastrāyastriṃśairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ māndāravāṇi mahāmāndāravāṇi ca puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S06n584:2: ṣaṣṭhaṃ śataṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ tasminneva samaye tasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaṃ saṃniṣaṇṇaṃ cābhūt |
S06n584:3: te utthāyāsanebhya ekāṃsānyuttarāsaṅgāni kṛtvā dakṣiṇāni jānumaṇḍalāni pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayāmāsuḥ |
S06n584:4: teṣā bhikṣūṇāṃ buddhānubhāvena te'ñjalipragrahā māndāravamahāmāndāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ paripūrṇā abhūvan |
S06n584:8: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta-vayaṃ bhagavan asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmaḥ,
S06n584:9: vayaṃ bhagavan anena anuttareṇa prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihāriṣyāma iti ||
S06n584:10: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prādurakarot |
S06n584:11: dharmatā khalu punareṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām- yadā smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti,
S06n584:12: atha tadā nānāvarṇā anekavarṇā raśmayo bhagavato mukhadvārānniścaranti-tadyathā nīlapītalohitāvadātamāñjiṣṭhasphaṭikarajatasuvarṇavarṇāḥ |
S06n584:13: te niścarya anantāparyantān lokadhātūnābhayā avabhāsya yāvadbrahmalokamabhyudgamya punareva pratyudāvṛtya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mūrdhanyantardhīyante ||
S06n584:14: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantametadavocat- nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti |
S06n584:17: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat-idamānanda bhikṣūṇāṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ śatamanāgate'dhvani tārakopame kalpe anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06n584:20: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ śāstāro loke bhaviṣyanti |
S06n584:21: teṣāṃ khalu punarānanda avakīrṇakusumanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarveṣāṃ samaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhaviṣyati |
S06n584:22: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāmavakīrṇakusumanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ samamevāyuḥpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati viṃśatikalpasahasrāṇi |
S06n584:23: sarveṣāmeva caikaikasya vaistārikaṃ pravacanaṃ bhaviṣyati pṛthuvaipulyaprāptaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu |
S06n584:26: sarve ca te yato yata eva grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīto'bhiniṣkramiṣyanti,
S06n584:28: pravartya ca yatra yatra ca vihariṣyanti,
S06n584:29: yato yataśca yatra yatraiva ca pravekṣanti,
S06n584:30: yena yena ca yato yata eva cābhiniṣkramiṣyanti,
S06n584:31: tatastatastatra tatra teṣāṃ praviśatāmabhiniṣkrāmatāṃ viharatāṃ ca pañcavarṇikānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ puṣpavarṣāḥ pravartiṣyante |
S06n584:32: tasmāttarhi ānanda bodhisattvairmahāsattvairuttamena vihāreṇa vihartukāmaiḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihartavyam |
S06n584:34: ye hi kecidānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06n584:35: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - manuṣyebhya evaite cyutā bhaviṣyanti |
S06n584:36: te ihopapannāstuṣitebhya eva vā devanikāyebhyaścyutā bhaviṣyanti manuṣyeṣvevopapannāḥ |
S06n584:38: tathā hi manuṣyeṣu tuṣiteṣu ca deveṣu iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā vistareṇa pracariṣyatīti |
S06n584:39: tathāgatāvalokitāḥ khalu punarānanda te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ,
S06n584:42: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
S06n584:44: udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya antaśo likhitvā bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavavadiṣyanti anuśāsiṣyanti saṃdarśayiṣyanti samādāpayiṣyanti samuttejayiṣyanti saṃpraharṣayiṣyanti |
S06n584:45: avaropitakuśalamūlāste ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāstathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu |
S06n584:46: na kevalaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmantike taiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitum,
S06n584:47: niḥsaṃśayaṃ khalu punarānanda tathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu taiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ,
S06n584:50: ye ca ānanda enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
S06n584:52: niṣṭhā ānanda tatra gantavyā-saṃmukhībhūtāste abhūvan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmiti |
S06n584:61: kiṃcāpyānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike kuśalamūlamavaropitam,
S06n584:62: evaṃ hi tanna śrāvakapratyekabuddhatvāya dāsyati vipākam |
S06n584:63: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na visaṃvādayiṣyati praṇidhānam,
S06n584:64: api tu khalu punarānanda prāyeṇa tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kṛtajñena bhavitavyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavatā |
S06n584:65: tasmāttarhi te ānanda parīndāmi anuparīndāmi imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā akṣarasaṃnipātādudgrahaṇāya dhāraṇāya vācanāya paryavāptaye pravartanāya cirasthitaye yatheyaṃ nāntardhīyeta |
S06n584:66: sacettvamānanda yo mayā te dharmo deśitaḥ sākṣāt sthāpayitvā prajñāpāramitām,
S06n584:69: na me tvamānanda etāvatā aparāddhaḥ syāḥ |
S06n584:70: yatkhalu punastvamānanda prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ vā padasāmantakaṃ vā nāśayeḥ,
S06n584:79: na mānito na pūjito nārcito nāpacāyitaḥ syām |
S06n584:80: ye'pi te ānanda atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ,
S06n584:81: te'pi tvayā ānanda na satkṛtā na gurukṛtā na mānitā na pūjitā nārcitā nāpacāyitā bhavanti |
S06n584:88: uktametadānanda tathāgatena-prajñāpāramitā atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ mātā jananī janayitrī sarvajñatāyā āhāriketi |
S06n584:89: tasmāttarhi ānanda parīndāmi anuparīndāmi te imāṃ prajñāpāramitām,
S06n584:102: sumanasikṛtā ca sudhṛtā ca suparyavāptā ca supravartitā ca tvayā ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kartavyā |
S06n584:105: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ hi ānanda tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ dharmakāyateti tāṃ dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya |
S06n584:106: yathā tattvamānanda etarhi me tathāgatasya tiṣṭhato dhriyamāṇasya yāpayato hitaiṣitayā premato vā gauravato vā kalyāṇato vā sparśavihārato vā kartavyaṃ vā dātavyaṃ vā samanvāhartavyaṃ vā manyase,
S06n584:107: tathaiva tvayā ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā likhitavyā bhāvayitavyā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā arcayitavyā apacāyitavyā,
S06n584:108: tayā hitaiṣitayā tena premṇā tena gauraveṇa tayā guṇavattayā |
S06n584:109: evaṃ tvayā ānanda ahaṃ pūjito bhavāmi,
S06n584:111: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike prema ca prasādaśca gauravaṃ cotpāditaṃ bhavati |
S06n584:112: yadi te ānanda ahaṃ priyo manaāpo'parityaktastathāgataḥ,
S06n584:113: tataste ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā priyā manaāpā aparityajanīyā bhavatu,
S06n584:116: bahvapi te ānanda ahaṃ bhāṣeyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ parīndanāmāramya kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā kalpaśatasahasraṃ vā kalpakoṭīṃ vā kalpakoṭīśataṃ vā kalpakoṭīsahasraṃ vā kalpakoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā tato vā upari |
S06n584:119: yādṛśāste atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya śāstāraḥ,
S06n584:122: aparimāṇayā parīndanayā prajñāpāramitāṃ te parīndāmyanuparīndāmi sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya hitāya sukhāya |
S06n584:130: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tena bodhiranuparigṛhītā bhavet |
S06n584:131: yo hi kaścidānanda enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pralujyamānāmanuparigṛhṇīte,
S06n584:132: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tena bodhiranuparigṛhītā bhavati |
S06n584:134: prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi ānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ |
S06n584:135: ye'pi te ānanda abhūvannatīte'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06n584:136: teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhūt |
S06n584:137: te'pi te ānanda anāgate'dhvani bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06n584:138: teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirbhaviṣyati |
S06n584:139: ye'pi te ānanda aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06n584:140: teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ |
S06n584:141: tasmāttarhi ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyopadeṣṭavyoddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā likhitavyā |
S06n584:144: eṣā hi ānanda prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātā jananī janayitrī |
S06n584:145: ye'pi kecidānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitvā niryātāḥ,
S06n584:147: sarve te ānanda prajñāpāramitāmāgamya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitāḥ |
S06n584:148: te'pi sarve enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu nirjātāḥ |
S06n584:150: prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi ānanda sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ āhārikā bhavantyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
S06n584:151: tasmāttarhi ānanda bhūyasyā mātrayā enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dvitīyakamapi tṛtīyakamapi parīndāmyanuparīndāmi te,
S06n584:153: eṣā hi ānanda tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmakṣayo dharmakoṣaḥ,
S06n584:156: yo hi ānanda atīte'dhvani anavarāgre saṃsāre sattvānāṃ buddhairbhagavadbhirdharmo deśitaḥ,
S06n584:159: ye'pi te ānanda anāgate'dhvani buddhā bhagavanto'parimite saṃsāre'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti,
S06n584:160: te'pi buddhā bhagavanta ita eva dharmakoṣāt,
S06n584:162: ye'pi te ānanda etarhi aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06n584:164: teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmita eva dharmakoṣātprabhāvanā bhavati,
S06n584:166: tasmāttarhi ānanda akṣaya eṣa dharmakoṣo yaduta prajñāpāramitākoṣaḥ |
S06n584:167: sacettvamānanda śrāvakayāni ---- gatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paśyanti sma bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaṃ bodhisattvagaṇa puraskṛtaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ sāgaropamāyāṃ gambhīrāyāmakṣobhyāyāṃ parṣadi bodhisattvairmahāsattvairacintyaguṇasamanvāgataiḥ parivṛtaṃ puraskṛtaṃ sarvaiścārhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravairniḥkleśairvaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittai suvimuktaprajñairājāneyairmahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyairapahṛtabhārairanuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacitaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptaiḥ ||
S06n584:168: atha khalu bhagavāṃstamṛddhyabhisaṃskāraṃ punareva pratisaṃharati sma |
S06n584:169: pratisaṃhṛte ca bhagavatā tasmin ṛddhyabhisaṃskāre na bhūyaḥ sa bhagavānakṣobhyastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma |
S06n584:172: tacca buddhakṣetraṃ tāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ gandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāṇāṃ manuṣyāmanuṣyāṇāṃ ca na cakṣuṣa ābhāsaṃ bhūya āgacchanti sma |
S06n584:174: pratisaṃhṛto hi tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāraḥ |
S06n584:175: tena te sarve sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ na bhūyaścakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchanti sma ||
S06n584:176: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma-evamānanda sarvadharmā na cakṣuṣo'pyābhāsamāgacchanti,
S06n584:184: nirīhakā hi ānanda sarvadharmā agrāhyā ākāśanirīhakatayā |
S06n584:187: evaṃ caranta ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāścaranti prajñāpāramitāyam |
S06n584:189: evaṃ śikṣamāṇā ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ śikṣante prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n584:190: sarvaśikṣāparamapāramitāṃ mahābodhiṃ prāptukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam |
S06n584:203: sarvalokahitāvahā sarvalokasukhāvahā anāthānāṃ nāthakarī buddhānujñātā buddhapraśastā |
S06n584:204: asyāmānanda prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atra śikṣāyāṃ sthitvā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumekena padāṅguṣṭhenotkṣipya punareva nikṣipeyuḥ |
S06n584:205: na ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmevaṃ syāt-utkṣipto vāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ nikṣipto veti |
S06n584:208: asyāmānanda prajñāpāramitāśikṣāyāṃ śikṣitvā buddhā bhagavanto'tītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣvasaṅgatāmanuprāptāḥ |
S06n584:210: sarvāsāṃ tāsāmānanda śikṣāṇāmiyameva prajñāpāramitāśikṣā agrā ākhyāyate,
S06n584:226: ākāśasya hi sa ānanda pramāṇaṃ vā kṣayaṃ vā paryantaṃ vā grahītavyaṃ manyetaḥ,
S06n584:227: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ vā kṣayaṃ vā paryantaṃ vā grahītavyaṃ manyeta |
S06n584:232: na mayā ānanda prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ vā kṣayo vā paryanto vā ākhyātaḥ |
S06n584:239: ānanda āha-kena punaḥ kāraṇena bhagavan bhagavatā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ nākhyātam ?
S06n584:245: ye'pi te ānanda atīte'dhvanyabhūvaṃstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06n584:247: na cānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kṣīṇā vā parikṣīṇā vā |
S06n584:248: ye'pi te ānanda anāgate'dhvani bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06n584:250: na cānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kṣeṣyate vā parikṣeṣyate vā |
S06n584:251: ye'pi te ānanda etarhyaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06n584:253: na ceyamānanda prajñāpāramitā kṣīyate vā parikṣīyate vā |
S06n584:256: na cānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kṣīyate vā parikṣīyate vā |
S06n584:258: ākāśaṃ hi sa ānanda kṣayayitavyaṃ manyeta,
S06n584:261: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ subhūteretadabhavat-gambhīramidaṃ sthānaṃ tathāgatena bhāṣitam |
S06n584:264: bhagavānāha - akṣayā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā yaduta ākāśākṣayatvātsarvadharmānutpādataḥ |
S06n584:265: subhūtirāha-kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā ?
S06n584:266: bhagavānāha-rūpākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā |
S06n584:268: vijñānākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā |
S06n584:269: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā |
S06n584:270: avidyākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā |
S06n584:271: evaṃ saṃskārākṣayatvena vijñānākṣayatvena nāmarūpākṣayatvena ṣaḍāyatanākṣayatvena sparśākṣayatvena vedanākṣayatvena tṛṣṇākṣayatvena upādānākṣayatvena bhavākṣayatvena jātyakṣayatvena jarāmaraṇākṣayatvena śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā |
S06n584:272: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antadvayavivarjitā pratītyasamutpādavyavalokanā |
S06n584:273: evaṃ vyavalokayan subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratītyanutpādamanādyantamadhyaṃ taṃ vyavalokayati |
S06n584:274: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāveṇiko dharmo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya,
S06n584:276: evaṃ vyavalokayataḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ sarvajñajñānapratilambho bhavati |
S06n584:277: yo hi kaścitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ anena akṣayābhirnirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayati,
S06n584:278: sa na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā sthāsyati,
S06n584:280: ye kecitsubhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vivartante'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06n584:281: sacet imān manasikārānidaṃ copāyakauśalyamanāgamya na jānanti-kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā,
S06n584:282: kathaṃ ca akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratītyasamutpādo vyavalokayitavya iti |
S06n584:283: ye kecitsubhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vivṛttā vivartante,
S06n584:285: sarve te idamupāyakauśalyamanāgamya vivṛttā vivartante vivartsyante ca |
S06n584:286: ye kecitsubhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā na vivṛttā na vivartante na vivartsyante ca,
S06n584:287: sarve te imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya na vivṛttā na vivartante na vivartsyante ca anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
S06n584:288: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā |
S06n584:289: evaṃ ca akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratītyasamutpādo vyavalokayitavyaḥ |
S06n584:290: evaṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayan na kaṃciddharmamahetukamutpadyamānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06n584:291: na kaṃciddharmaṃ nityaṃ vā dhruvaṃ vā śāśvataṃ vā avipariṇāmadharmakaṃ vā samanupaśyati |
S06n584:292: na kaṃciddharmaṃ kārakaṃ vā vedakaṃ vā samanupaśyati |
S06n584:293: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmakṣayābhinirhāreṇa abhinirharato'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ pratītyasamutpādavyavalokanā |
S06n584:294: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmakṣayābhinirhāreṇa abhinirharan pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayati,
S06n584:295: tasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06n584:296: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06n584:299: evaṃ na saṃskārānna vijñānaṃ na nāmarūpaṃ na ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na sparśaṃ na vedanāṃ na tṛṣṇāṃ nopādānaṃ na bhavaṃ na jātiṃ na jarāmaraṇaṃ na śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsān samanupaśyati |
S06n584:303: yena dharmeṇa idaṃ vā anyadvā buddhakṣetraṃ samanupaśyet |
S06n584:304: iyaṃ sā subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā |
S06n584:305: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06n584:306: tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyān paramaśokaśalyasamarpito bhavati |
S06n584:307: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo mātāpitṛṣu kālagateṣu paramaśokaśalyasamarpito bhavati,
S06n584:308: evameva subhūte yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06n584:309: tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyān paramaśokaśalyasamarpito bhavati ||
S06n584:310: subhūtirāha-kimeka eva bhagavan māraḥ pāpīyān paramaśokaśalyasamarpito bhavati,
S06n584:311: utāho bahavo mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ paramaśokaśalyasamarpitā bhavanti,
S06n584:312: utāho ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ te'pi sarve tasmin samaye paramaśokaśalyasamarpitā bhavanti ?
S06n584:313: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati,
S06n584:314: tasmin samaye ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāṃ pāpīyāṃsaḥ te sarve paramaśokaśalyasamarpitā bhavanti,
S06n584:317: prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa hi viharato'sya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sadevamānuṣāsuro loko'vatāraṃ na labhate grahaṇāya,
S06n584:319: yatrainaṃ gṛhītvā viheṭhayedvā vivartayedvā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
S06n584:320: tasmāttarhiḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam |
S06n584:322: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ hi subhūte carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati,
S06n584:323: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati |
S06n584:324: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ hi subhūte carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti,
S06n584:326: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yāni kānicinmārakarmāṇyutpadyeran,
S06n584:329: sarvopāyakauśalyāni subhūte parigrahītukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam,
S06n584:331: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06n584:333: tasmin samaye subhūte na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ye'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06n584:336: evaṃ samanvāhṛtya tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena punarevaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam-ahamapyetān dharmānanuprāpsyāmi ye tairbuddhairbhagavadbhiranuprāptā iti |
S06n584:337: evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā ime cittotpādā utpādayitavyā abhinirhartavyā divasasyātyayena,
S06n584:339: yaśca subhūte aupalambhiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06n584:341: yo'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divasasyātyayena imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmabhinirharet,
S06n584:345: yo'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran imāṃścittotpādānutpādayati divasasyātyayena antaśo'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakamapi |
S06n584:347: tathāgatasamanvāhṛtasya hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kā gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā ?
S06n584:348: tathāgatasamanvāhṛtasya hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nānyā gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā anyatrānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
S06n584:359: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte gandhahastino bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ya etarhyakṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caratīti ||
